item.title: Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO Day 3 Live Updates: Issue booked 5.65x so far, check IKS IPO GMP, review, more | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO Day 3 Live Updates

Date & Source: 16 Dec, 2024, LiveMint

Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO, backed by Rekha Jhunjhunwala, opened for public subscription on December 12 and is set to close today, December 16. The IPO has a price band of ₹1,265-1,329 per share.

  • The IPO has seen a subscription rate of 7.01x so far.
  • Retail Individual Investors (RIIs) saw a subscription of 7.47x.
  • The offering raised ₹1,120 crore from anchor investors.
  • It consists solely of an Offer For Sale (OFS) of 1.88 crore equity shares.
"Inventurus Knowledge Solutions share price was trading at a premium of ₹405 in the grey market." - Investor Insight

The IPO's strong subscription rates indicate high investor interest, particularly among retail and institutional segments. The listing of shares is expected to happen on December 19, 2024.

item.title: India's economy ends 2024 with solid momentum as business growth hits 4-month high, PMI shows - The Economic Times
item.description:
India's Economy Ends 2024 with Strong Business Growth, PMI Shows

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Economic Times

India's private sector output concluded 2024 positively, marked by a four-month high in business growth driven by robust demand in services and manufacturing, alongside record job growth.

Key highlights include:

  • Private sector output surged to the fastest pace in four months.
  • HSBC's December Composite Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) rose to 60.7, indicating strong growth.
  • Manufacturing PMI increased to 57.4, while services PMI hit a four-month high of 60.8.
  • Strong growth momentum is indicated by increased domestic orders and hiring.
  • Inflationary pressures eased with consumer inflation reported at 5.48%.
“The expansion in new domestic orders quickened, suggesting a pick-up in growth momentum in the economy.” - Ines Lam, economist at HSBC

Overall, the results paint an optimistic outlook for India’s economic growth heading into 2025, with an increased hiring pace and improved demand forecasts.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment to be finalised today: Steps to check status on BSE, NSE, KFin Tech - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment to be finalised today: Steps to check status on BSE, NSE, KFin Tech

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: CNBC TV18

Supermarket chain Vishal Mega Mart will finalize the allotment of its IPO today. The shares are set to debut on the BSE and NSE on December 18.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to 13 and was subscribed 27.28 times.
  • Price band for the issue was ₹74-78 per share.
  • Qualified Institutional Buyers (QIBs) subscribed 80.75 times the reserved shares, while non-institutional investors (NIIs) subscribed 14.24 times.
  • Retail investor portion was subscribed 2.31 times.

How to check Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment status:

  1. Visit the BSE IPO allotment page, select 'Equity', choose 'Vishal Mega Mart', and enter your application number or PAN.
  2. For KFin Technologies, select 'Vishal Mega Mart', enter your PAN, application number, or DP/Client ID, then submit.

Refunds for unsuccessful bids will be initiated on December 17.

Vishal Mega Mart’s IPO details:

The company raised ₹2,400 crore from anchor investors before the IPO, which is an Offer for Sale (OFS) of equity shares worth ₹8,000 crore in total.

“Vishal Mega Mart operates 645 stores across 414 cities in India, targeting middle- and lower-middle-income groups.”

Established in 2001, Vishal Mega Mart offers a mix of private-label products and third-party brands.

item.title: IITian CEO's 'What Do You Think' question on Green Card, gets this 'one-word' answer from Elon Musk - The Times of India
item.description:
Elon Musk Responds to IITian CEO's Green Card Question

Publication Date: [Date not provided]Source: Times of India

The CEO of an IITian startup raised a question about the Green Card to Elon Musk, who succinctly responded with a single word.

  • The IITian CEO's query was about the Green Card process.
  • Elon Musk's response was reportedly just one word.
  • The interaction highlights the challenges surrounding immigration policies for tech professionals.
"One word," was Musk's simple response.

This brief exchange underscores the ongoing conversation about immigration and its impact on the tech industry.

item.title: Mobikwik IPO allotment expected today; Here’s how to check status, GMP online - CNBCTV18
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO Allotment Expected Today: How to Check Status and GMP Online

Published on: December 16, 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

The allotment of shares in MobiKwik's ₹572-crore IPO is set to be finalized today, following an overwhelming response from investors.

  • The IPO was booked nearly 120 times, receiving bids for 141.72 crore shares against the 1.18 crore shares on offer.
  • Retail subscriptions accounted for 134.67 times, while qualified institutional buyers (QIBs) subscribed 119.50 times.
  • Non-institutional investors bid 35.27 crore shares against 32.37 lakh shares, resulting in an oversubscription of 108.95 times.
  • Investors can check their allotment status on the NSE and BSE websites or via the registrar, Link Intime Services Pvt Ltd.
  • Share credit into demat accounts is scheduled for December 17, and shares will be listed on December 18.
"MobiKwik is a fintech company offering prepaid digital wallets and online payment services."

With significant demand demonstrated during its IPO, MobiKwik is poised for a notable market entry, and investors are advised to stay updated on their allotment status.

item.title: Five Stocks To Buy Today: Delhivery, Tata Motors, LIC Housing, Astral And Bharat Dynamics - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Five Stocks To Buy Today: Delhivery, Tata Motors, LIC Housing, Astral And Bharat Dynamics

Date: 16 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit

Analysts have recommended ‘Buy’ calls on shares of Delhivery, Tata Motors, LIC Housing, Astral, and Bharat Dynamics for December 16, with target prices and performance insights.

  • Delhivery: Buy at Rs 385, target Rs 445, stop loss Rs 353. Potential upside of 16.2%.
  • Tata Motors: Buy at Rs 782, target Rs 920, stop loss Rs 730. Potential upside of 21.2%.
  • LIC Housing: Buy at Rs 610, target Rs 685, stop loss Rs 574. Potential upside of 19.8%.
  • Astral: Buy at Rs 1,800, target Rs 2,010, stop loss Rs 1,690. Potential upside of 12.9%.
  • Bharat Dynamics: Buy at Rs 1,250, target Rs 1,365, stop loss Rs 1,187.

With the stock markets trending upward, these stocks represent promising investment opportunities.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment: How to check status online on KFin Technologies, NSE, BSE - Upstox
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment: How to check status online on KFin Technologies, NSE, BSE

Publication Date: December 16
Source: Upstox

Introduction

The allotment of the ₹8,000 crore Vishal Mega Mart IPO, which was highly oversubscribed, is expected to be finalized soon, with investors eager to check the status online.

Key Points

  • The IPO was subscribed 27.28 times overall.
  • Qualified institutional buyers showed significant interest with an 80.75 times subscription.
  • Retail investors had a subscription rate of 2.31 times.
  • IPO listing date on BSE and NSE is set for December 18.
  • Price band was fixed at ₹74-₹78 per share.

How to Check IPO Status

On Kfin Technologies:

  • Visit the Kfin Technologies' IPO allotment status page.
  • Select one of the five server links.
  • If allotted, select the company's name from the dropdown.
  • Provide your application number, Demat account number, or PAN.
  • Complete the captcha and submit.

On NSE:

  • Go to the NSE IPO bid verification page.
  • New users must register.
  • Choose 'Vishal Mega Mart'.
  • Enter your application number.
  • Click on submit.

Conclusion

Vishal Mega Mart aims to serve the middle and lower-middle-income groups in India, operating 626 stores as of June 2024. Investors are anticipating the IPO allotment, which is crucial for the company's market entry.

item.title: Stocks To Watch Today: RIL, Afcons Infra, Nazara Tech, Paytm, Swiggy and other stocks in focus on Dec 16 - ET Now
item.description:
Stocks To Watch Today: RIL, Afcons Infra, Nazara Tech, Paytm, Swiggy and other stocks in focus on Dec 16

Publication Date: Updated Dec 16, 2024
Source: ET NOW News

The Gift Nifty suggests a flat start for Sensex and Nifty. The Sensex rose significantly on Friday, while several stocks are poised for attention today due to various acquisitions and orders.

  • Reliance Industries: Acquired a 74% stake in Navi Mumbai IIA for Rs 1,628.03 crore.
  • Bharat Forge: Acquired a 25% stake in Edgelab S.p.A for €2.5 million.
  • Aurobindo Pharma: Ordered to reverse ITC and GST payments of Rs 5.68 crore.
  • Lupin: Acquired three anti-diabetes trademarks from Boehringer Ingelheim.
  • Vedanta: Announcing its fourth interim dividend for FY 2024-25.
  • Paytm: Sold 5.4% stake in PayPay Corp to SoftBank for Rs 2,364 crore.
  • Dixon Technologies: Forming a joint venture with Vivo to manufacture smartphones.
  • JK Paper: Merging its three subsidiaries and acquiring a majority stake in Radhesham Wellpack.
  • HG Infra: Secured a Rs 862 crore order for highway construction.
  • Afcons Infrastructure: Received an LOA for the Rs 1,006.74 crore Bhopal Metro Phase 1 project.
  • Jaiprakash Power Ventures: Stay on penalties for illegal sand extraction.
  • Lemon Tree Hotels: Signed a new property in Bhuj, Gujarat.
Disclaimer: The above article is meant for informational purposes only and should not be considered as any investment advice.

This article outlines significant movements and acquisitions in the stock market, suggesting potential investment interests for traders and investors.

item.title: MobiKwik IPO allotment: How to check status online on Link Intime India, NSE, BSE - Upstox
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO allotment: How to check status online on Link Intime India, NSE, BSE

Date: December 16, 2023   Source: Financial News

The MobiKwik IPO allotment status will be finalized on December 16. Users can verify their allotment status online through the Link Intime India, NSE, and BSE websites, with shares set to list on December 18.

  • The IPO received bids for over 14.17 crore shares, leading to a subscription rate of 119.38 times.
  • Retail investors subscribed 134.67 times the designated quota.
  • The company raised ₹257 crore from anchor investors prior to the offering.
  • The price range for shares was set between ₹265-₹279.
“The total subscription of the IPO reached 119.38 times, showcasing strong demand.”

The listing of One MobiKwik Systems is anticipated to be a significant event for investors, highlighting the growing interest in fintech companies in India.

item.title: Dhanlaxmi Crop Science IPO: Shares to debut today. Here's what GMP indicates - The Economic Times
item.description:
Dhanlaxmi Crop Science Shares Debut 90% Above IPO Price

Publication Date: Monday, October 23, 2024 | Source: Economic Times

The shares of Dhanlaxmi Crop Science made a stellar debut on the NSE SME platform, listing at Rs 104.5, which is a 90% premium over the IPO price.

  • The company received a subscription of 550 times for its IPO, consisting of a fresh equity sale of 43.28 lakh shares.
  • Dhanlaxmi Crop Science specializes in developing and selling seeds for a variety of field crops and vegetables, leveraging over 18 years of industry experience.
  • The company integrates traditional breeding techniques with biotechnology to enhance product quality and yield.
  • As of September 2024, the company reported total revenues of Rs 119 crore and a net profit of Rs 8.2 crore.
“Dhanlaxmi produced seeds for 24 different field crops and vegetables, with cotton seeds contributing 95.64% of its revenue from operations.”

This successful listing reflects strong investor interest and highlights the company’s potential in the competitive Indian seeds market.
